content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --STAT
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --STAT
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: NOT DONE
# TODO: Essentially requires a lookup in the (ND) codelist through a CDISC-Library query     
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.143
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --STAT is non-empty and does not contain a value from
  the ND codelist
Outcome:
  Message: --STAT does not contain a value from the (ND) codelist
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '143'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: (ND) codelist is referenced in the domain table
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 6.3.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - SC

json.Description: Trigger error when --STAT is non-empty and does not contain a value from the ND codelist

Outcome.Message: --STAT does not contain a value from the (ND) codelist

Citations.Cited_Guidance: (ND) codelist is referenced in the domain table
